review: I have used very little  as I have a  full time job but what I have seen so far is great.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works better than expected. Getting rid of cable!
author: jason gilles

review: It does what it's supposed to do but streaming gets interrupted very easily. I am thinking of upgrading to the box, supposedly the speeds are more consistent.
author: Peter

review: THE BEST THING I EVER INVESTED IN!
author: PreshuzGurl "Dance like no one’s watching"

review: The reason I bought the fire stick was for Amazon video/music and the MLB app vs another streaming stick. The MLB app is really poor. It stutters and doesn't stream well.
author: Scott B Sebelius

review: Works brilliantly, easy set up, loads of choice.
author: Teach

review: Received the fire stick as a gift and I love it. It's s very simple & easy to use the setup was very quick. I would recommend this for anyone to purchase them selves or definitely to give to someone as a gift.
author: Passion

review: Yes it did but it uses more data than my computer, I watched not even a whole movie and it used 40 gigs of data

review: Easy for anyone to set up. Learning more about it everyday. Great product.

review: It's just perfect present for my friends nowadays.
